summary: Upgraded SSL security from Flexible to Full mode by configuring Nginx HTTPS with Let's Encrypt certificates and changing Cloudflare SSL mode. Now provides end-to-end encryption from visitor to origin server, eliminating unencrypted traffic segments.
current_status: API is fully secured with end-to-end HTTPS encryption. Nginx serves HTTPS on port 443, Cloudflare uses Full SSL mode, and all traffic is encrypted. Certificate valid until April 2026 with auto-renewal configured.
